H0.text: Malleable is a chemical property of silver.

H1.text: White metal is a chemical property of silver.

H2.text: Conductor of heat is a chemical property of silver.

H3.text: Reacting with nitric acid is a chemical property of silver.

A4.text: Silver is extremely ductile and malleable.

A5.text: Silver exhibits the highest thermal conductivity of any metal.

A6.text: Silver can be prepared by dissolving it in nitric acid.
